name: Bill escape the black hole
description:
Escape the black hole !

Today, Bill made a mess in a scientfic lab and created a black hole. So he ran to his flying minecart to escape. Try to go the much further while escaping the objects !

Entry of #WeeklyGameJam73.

Commands

  • Press Space to jump
  • Press left arrow to spin and release to go normal

Principle

Make Wheelies and backflip to win some boost speed and bonus points.  Avoid pieces of the lab attracted by the black hole.

Good luck!
